abstract: The Carlyle Group said that Louis V. Gerstner Jr., the former I.B.M. chief who became the private equity firm’s chairman five years ago, would step down from that post on Sept. 30.
snippet: The Carlyle Group said that Louis V. Gerstner Jr., the former I.B.M. chief who became the private equity firm’s chairman five years ago, would step down from that post on Sept. 30.
lead_paragraph: The Carlyle Group said on Tuesday that Louis V. Gerstner Jr., the former I.B.M. chief who became the private equity firm’s chairman five years ago, would step down from that post on Sept. 30.

headline.main: Leader of the Carlyle Group to Leave Post in September
headline.print_headline: Leader of the Carlyle Group To Leave Post in September

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
